title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When I open a Java editor in the Photon version, I am unable to see the popup menu in the left vertical ruler. This menu should allow me to add breakpoints and marks, but it is not appearing.
OB: The popup menu in the Java editor ruler is not showing up when I right click on the left vertical ruler.
EB: When I right click on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, a popup menu should appear that allows me to add breakpoints and marks.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected: A popup menu should appear allowing you to add breakpoints and marks.
Actual: The popup menu does not appear.
